column4: can somebody help with one command, dd? I want to write an bootable image (an os) to usb drive.
They gave me an code line "dd if=<path_to/img_file.iso> of=/dev/da0 bs=1m", I changed /dev/da0 to /dev/sdc (my usb drive, i think)=> my output, dd: invalid number `1m'. What I have to do?
Who gave that command to you
